title: Several anti-Govt. protests ongoing in Colombo
body_lines: People have gathered in several areas in Colombo to protest against the Government for their poor management of economic policies, which created mess in the country.
A protest is being staged in the Beruwala town demanding solutions to gas, fuel shortages and power cuts. Traffic has also been restricted to one lane as a result of the protest.
Meanwhile, a group of people have assembled opposite the Nelum Pokuna Theatre to show their agitation over the Government.
Police and other security forces are on alert to report to areas in case of emergency and tense situation. (Sheain Fernandopulle)
